statements: SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, research_area FROM Researchers WHERE research_area='Biology';
SELECT DISTINCT research_area FROM Researchers;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name = 'John Smith'
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Researchers WHERE research_area = 'Computer Science'
SELECT * FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%Doe%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Researchers
SELECT * FROM Experimental_Data WHERE reactor_id = 1;
SELECT temperature, pressure FROM Experimental_Data WHERE temperature > 500 AND pressure < 1000;
SELECT reactor_id, efficiency FROM Simulation_Results WHERE efficiency >= 0.8 ORDER BY reactor_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MIN(pressure) FROM Experimental_Data GROUP BY reactor_id HAVING AVG(temperature) > 400;
SELECT COUNT(*), MAX(efficiency) FROM Simulation_Results WHERE reactor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Experimental_Data WHERE reactor_id = 1;
SELECT reactor_id, temperature FROM Experimental_Data WHERE pressure > 10.0;
SELECT * FROM Simulation_Results WHERE efficiency < 0.8 ORDER BY simulation_id DESC;
SELECT reactor_id, efficiency FROM Simulation_Results JOIN Experimental_Data ON Simulation_Results.reactor_id = Experimental_Data.reactor_id WHERE Experimental_Data.temperature < 500.0;
SELECT reactor_id, pressure FROM Experimental_Data WHERE reactor_id IN (2, 3, 5) ORDER BY pressure ASC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_data ORDER BY reactor_id ASC, experiment_id DESC;
SELECT reactor_id, temperature, pressure FROM experimental_data WHERE temperature > 50;
SELECT reactor_id, experiment_id, time FROM experimental_data WHERE pressure <= 500 ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT simulation_id, reactor_id, simulation_duration FROM simulation_results WHERE simulation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, reactor_id, finding_type, findings_date FROM analysis_findings WHERE finding_type = 'error' ORDER BY findings_date;
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE temperature > 500 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT reactor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM experimental_data GROUP BY reactor_id HAVING avg_temp > 600;
SELECT analysis_id, finding_description FROM analysis_findings WHERE finding_type = 'error' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM simulation_results WHERE simulation_duration < 10 AND simulation_output LIKE '%success%';
SELECT simulation_id, reactor_id FROM simulation_results WHERE simulation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM experimental_data;
SELECT id, research_id, experiment_date FROM experimental_data WHERE reactor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM simulation_results ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, reactor_id, result_data->'type' FROM simulation_results WHERE simulation_id = 1;
SELECT id, analysis_id, finding FROM analysis_findings WHERE finding ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University';
SELECT * FROM simulation_results ORDER BY simulation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM analysis_findings WHERE finding ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT id, research_id, reactor_id, experiment_date FROM experimental_data WHERE reactor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalData ORDER BY data_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT researcher_id, AVG(data_value) AS avg_data_value FROM ExperimentalData GROUP BY researcher_id;
SELECT reactor_name, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM ExperimentalData JOIN Reactors ON ExperimentalData.reactor_id = Reactors.reactor_id GROUP BY reactor_name;
SELECT researcher_name, MAX(data_value) AS max_data_value FROM ExperimentalData JOIN Researchers ON ExperimentalData.researcher_id = Researchers.researcher_id GROUP BY researcher_name;
SELECT * FROM SimulationResults WHERE simulation_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY simulation_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT reactor_id, reactor_name, reactor_type FROM Reactors WHERE reactor_location = 'Laboratory';
SELECT researcher_name, reactor_name, reactor_location FROM Researchers JOIN Reactors ON Researchers.researcher_id = Reactors.reactor_id WHERE Researchers.researcher_id = 3;
SELECT data_time, data_value FROM ExperimentalData WHERE experiment_id = 5;
